몬스터 (Di-Do)

MONSTERS (Di-Do)

소화귀

DIGESTER
Medium Magical Beast
히트 다이스:8d10+24 (68 hp)
선제권:+6
속도:60 ft. (12 squares)
방어도:17 (+2 Dex, +5 natural), touch 12, flat-footed 15
기본 공격/드잡이:+8/+11
공격:Claw +11 melee (1d8+4)
전력 공격:Claw +11 melee (1d8+4)
공간범위/도달범위:5 ft./5 ft.
특수 공격:Acid spray
Special Qualities:암흑시야 60 ft., immunity to acid, 저광시야, 냄새
내성 굴림:Fort +9, Ref +10, Will +3
능력:Str 17, Dex 15, Con 17, Int 2, Wis 12, Cha 10
스킬:숨기 +9, 듣기 +6, 도약 +21, 감지 +6
특기:경계, 향상된 선제권, 번개 같은 반사신경
환경:Warm forests
집단:Solitary or pack (3–6)
도전 지수:6
전리품:None
성향:Always neutral
성장:9–12 HD (Medium); 13–24 HD (Large)
레벨 보정:—

A 소화귀 stands about 5 feet tall and is 7 feet long from snout to tail. It weighs about 350 pounds,

전투

COMBAT

A 소화귀 is a hunting and eating machine. When it is not hungry (which is rarely), it lies low and avoids most other creatures. When hunting, it looks about for a likely target, then 돌격 forth and delivers a gout of acid. If the initial 공격 is insufficient to kill the prey, the 소화귀 공격 with its hind feet until it can spray acid again.

Acid Spray (Ex): A 소화귀 can spray acid in a 20-foot cone, dealing 4d8 points of 피해 to everything in the area. Once a 소화귀 uses this ability, it can’t use it again until 1d4 rounds later.

The creature can also produce a concentrated stream of acid that deals 8d8 points of 피해 to a single target within 5 feet. In either case, a DC 17 Reflex save halves the 피해. The save DC is 건강-based.

스킬: A 소화귀’s coloration gives it a +4 racial bonus on 숨기 checks. It also has a +4 racial bonus on 도약 checks.

공룡

DINOSAUR

공룡 come in many sizes and shapes. Bigger varieties have drab coloration, while smaller 공룡 have more colorful markings. Most 공룡 have a pebbly skin texture.

전투

COMBAT

공룡 take full advantage of their size and 속도. The swift carnivores stalk prey, staying hidden in 엄폐 until they can get into 돌격 범위 and rush to the 공격. Herbivores frequently 쇄도 and 짓밟기 their opponents.

데이노니쿠스

DEINONYCHUS
Large Animal
히트 다이스:4d8+16 (34 hp)
선제권:+2
속도:60 ft. (12 squares)
방어도:16 (–1 size, +2 Dex, +5 natural), touch 11, flat-footed 14
기본 공격/드잡이:+3/+11
공격:Talons +6 melee (2d6+4)
전력 공격:Talons +6 melee (2d6+4) and 2 foreclaws +1 melee (1d3+2) and bite +1 melee (2d4+2)
공간범위/도달범위:10 ft./5 ft.
특수 공격:Pounce
Special Qualities:저광시야, 냄새
내성 굴림:Fort +8, Ref +6, Will +2
능력:Str 19, Dex 15, Con 19, Int 2, Wis 12, Cha 10
스킬:숨기 +8, 도약 +26, 듣기 +10, 감지 +10, 생존 +10
특기:달리기, 추적
환경:Warm forests
집단:Solitary, pair, or pack (3–6)
도전 지수:3
전리품:None
성향:Always neutral
성장:5–8 HD (Large)
레벨 보정:—

A 데이노니쿠스 is bright green along its back and flanks, with a much lighter shade of the same color on its underside. The body has darker 감지 or stripes. Its tail extends straight out behind itself, held aloft by an intricate structure of bony supports, thus allowing its weight to be carried entirely by the back legs. It weighs about 600 pounds.

전투

Combat

A 데이노니쿠스 uses a combination of 속도, grasping forearms, large teeth, and hind legs with ripping talons. It hunts by running at prey, leaping, and ripping with its rear talons as it claws and bites. The talons count as one 공격. A 데이노니쿠스 has a relatively large brain for a 공룡, and its pack hunts with cunning tactics.

Pounce (Ex): If a 데이노니쿠스 돌격, it can make a 전력 공격.

스킬: A 데이노니쿠스 has a +8 racial bonus on 숨기, 도약, 듣기, 감지, and 생존 checks.

엘라스모사우루스

ELASMOSAURUS
Huge Animal
히트 다이스:10d8+66 (111 hp)
선제권:+2
속도:20 ft. (4 squares), 수영 50 ft.
방어도:13 (–2 size, +2 Dex, +3 natural), touch 10, flat-footed 11
기본 공격/드잡이:+7/+23
공격:Bite +13 melee (2d8+12)
전력 공격:Bite +13 melee (2d8+12)
공간범위/도달범위:15 ft./10 ft.
특수 공격:—
Special Qualities:저광시야, 냄새
내성 굴림:Fort +15, Ref +9, Will +4
능력:Str 26, Dex 14, Con 22, Int 2, Wis 13, Cha 9
스킬:숨기 –4*, 듣기 +4, 감지 +9, 수영 +16
특기:회피, 상급 인내력, 거칠음 (2)
환경:Warm aquatic
집단:Solitary, pair, or herd (5–8)
도전 지수:7
전리품:None
성향:Always neutral
성장:11–20 HD (Huge); 21–30 HD (Gargantuan)
레벨 보정:—

Though it resides primarily in the water, an 엘라스모사우루스 only breathes air. An 엘라스모사우루스 has a total length of some 30 feet, including a tail half as long as its entire body, and weighs about 5,000 pounds. Observers who see only its head or tail might easily mistake it for a massive 뱀.

전투

Combat

An 엘라스모사우루스 is aggressive and 공격 anything it notices. The creature is strong, fast, and highly maneuverable, able to turn quickly and lunge at prey. When hunting, it travels with its head out of the water, snapping down quickly to seize prey.

스킬: *An 엘라스모사우루스 has a +8 racial bonus on 숨기 checks in water.

메가랍토르

MEGARAPTOR
Huge Animal
히트 다이스:8d8+43 (79 hp)
선제권:+2
속도:60 ft. (12 squares)
방어도:16 (–2 size, +2 Dex, +6 natural), touch 10, flat-footed 14
기본 공격/드잡이:+6/+19
공격:Talons +9 melee (2d8+5)
전력 공격:Talons +9 melee (2d8+5) and 2 foreclaws +4 melee (1d4+2) and bite +4 melee (2d6+2)
공간범위/도달범위:15 ft./10 ft.
특수 공격:Pounce
Special Qualities:저광시야, 냄새
내성 굴림:Fort +10, Ref +8, Will +4
능력:Str 21, Dex 15, Con 21, Int 2, Wis 15, Cha 10
스킬:숨기 +5, 도약 +27, 듣기 +12, 감지 +12, 생존 +12
특기:달리기, 거칠음, 추적
환경:Warm forests
집단:Solitary, pair, or pack (3–6)
도전 지수:6
전리품:None
성향:Always neutral
성장:9–16 HD (Huge); 17–24 HD (Gargantuan)
레벨 보정:—

This creature is a larger version of the 데이노니쿠스, standing about 12 feet tall with a total length of 24 feet. It has the same appearance, habits, and 능력 of the smaller version.

Pounce (Ex): If a 메가랍토르 돌격, it can make a 전력 공격.

스킬: A 메가랍토르 has a +8 racial bonus on 숨기, 도약, 듣기, 감지, and 생존 checks.

트리케라톱스

TRICERATOPS
Huge Animal
히트 다이스:16d8+124 (196 hp)
선제권:–1
속도:30 ft. (6 squares)
방어도:18 (–2 size, –1 Dex, +11 natural), touch 7, flat-footed 18
기본 공격/드잡이:+12/+30
공격:Gore +20 melee (2d8+15)
전력 공격:Gore +20 melee (2d8+15)
공간범위/도달범위:15 ft./10 ft.
특수 공격:Powerful 돌격, 짓밟기 2d12+15
Special Qualities:저광시야, 냄새
내성 굴림:Fort +19, Ref +9, Will +6
능력:Str 30, Dex 9, Con 25, Int 1, Wis 12, Cha 7
스킬:듣기 +13, 감지 +12
특기:경계, 상급 인내력, 거칠음 (4)
환경:Temperate plains
집단:Solitary, pair, or herd (5–8)
도전 지수:9
전리품:None
성향:Always neutral
성장:17–32 HD (Huge); 33–48 HD (Gargantuan)
레벨 보정:—

A 트리케라톱스 has a body about 25 feet long and weighs about 20,000 pounds.

전투

Combat

These creatures are likely to 돌격 and skewer any creature of at least Large size that infringes on their territory. A 트리케라톱스 uses its 짓밟기 공격 on smaller opponents.

Powerful 돌격 (Ex): When a 트리케라톱스 돌격, its gore 공격 deals 4d8+20 points of 피해.

짓밟기 (Ex): Reflex half DC 28. The save DC is 근력-based.

티라노사우루스

TYRANNOSAURUS
Huge Animal
히트 다이스:18d8+99 (180 hp)
선제권:+1
속도:40 ft. (8 squares)
방어도:14 (–2 size, +1 Dex, +5 natural) touch 9, flat-footed 13
기본 공격/드잡이:+13/+30
공격:Bite +20 melee (3d6+13)
전력 공격:Bite +20 melee (3d6+13)
공간범위/도달범위:15 ft./10 ft.
특수 공격:Improved grab, swallow whole
Special Qualities:저광시야, 냄새
내성 굴림:Fort +16, Ref +12, Will +8
능력:Str 28, Dex 12, Con 21, Int 2, Wis 15, Cha 10
스킬:숨기 –2, 듣기 +14, 감지 +14
특기:경계, 향상된 고유 공격 (bite), 달리기, 거칠음 (3), 추적
환경:Warm plains
집단:Solitary or pair
도전 지수:8
전리품:None
성향:Always neutral
성장:19–36 HD (Huge); 37–54 HD (Gargantuan)
레벨 보정:—

Despite its enormous size and 6-ton weight, a 티라노사우루스 is a swift runner. Its head is nearly 6 feet long, and its teeth are from 3 to 6 inches in length. It is slightly more than 30 feet long from nose to tail.

전투

Combat

A 티라노사우루스 pursues and eats just about anything it sees. Its tactics are simple—돌격 in and bite.

Improved Grab (Ex): To use this ability, a 티라노사우루스 must hit an opponent of up to one size smaller with its bite 공격. It can then attempt to start a 드잡이 as a free action without provoking an 공격 of opportunity. If it wins the 드잡이 check, it establishes a hold and can try to swallow the foe the following round.

Swallow Whole (Ex): A 티라노사우루스 can try to swallow a grabbed opponent of up to two sizes smaller by making a successful 드잡이 check. The swallowed creature takes 2d8+8 points of bludgeoning 피해 and 8 points of acid 피해 per round from the 티라노사우루스’s gizzard. A swallowed creature can cut its way out by using a 빛 slashing or piercing weapon to deal 25 points of 피해 to the gizzard (AC 12). Once the creature exits, muscular action closes the hole; another swallowed opponent must cut its own way out.

A Huge 티라노사우루스’s gizzard can hold 2 Medium, 8 Small, 32 Tiny, or 128 Diminutive or smaller opponents.

스킬: A 티라노사우루스 has a +2 racial bonus on 듣기 and 감지 checks.

흉폭한 동물

DIRE ANIMAL

흉폭한 동물 are larger, tougher, meaner versions of ordinary animals. Each kind tends to have a feral, prehistoric, or even demonic appearance.

흉폭한 유인원

DIRE APE
Large Animal
히트 다이스:5d8+13 (35 hp)
선제권:+2
속도:30 ft. (6 squares), 등반 15 ft.
방어도:15 (–1 size, +2 Dex, +4 natural), touch 11, flat-footed 13
기본 공격/드잡이:+3/+13
공격:Claw +8 melee (1d6+6)
전력 공격:2 claws +8 melee (1d6+6) and bite +3 melee (1d8+3)
공간범위/도달범위:10 ft./10 ft.
특수 공격:Rend 2d6+9
Special Qualities:저광시야, 냄새
내성 굴림:Fort +6, Ref +6, Will +5
능력:Str 22, Dex 15, Con 14, Int 2, Wis 12, Cha 7
스킬:등반 +14, 듣기 +5, 조용히 이동 +4, 감지 +6
특기:경계, 거칠음
환경:Warm forests
집단:Solitary or company (5–8)
도전 지수:3
전리품:None
성향:Always neutral
성장:6–15 HD (Large)
레벨 보정:—

A 흉폭한 유인원 stands about 9 feet tall and weighs from 800 to 1,200 pounds.

전투

Combat

흉폭한 유인원 공격 anything that enters their territory, even other 흉폭한 유인원. If an opponent’s 갑옷 foils a 흉폭한 유인원’s 공격, the creature will attempt to 드잡이 and pin, then rend the prone opponent.

Rend (Ex): A 흉폭한 유인원 that hits with both claw 공격 latches onto the opponent’s body and tears the flesh. This 공격 automatically deals an extra 2d6+12 points of 피해.

스킬: 흉폭한 유인원 have a +8 racial bonus on 등반 checks and can always choose to take 10 on 등반 checks, even if rushed or threatened.

흉폭한 오소리

DIRE BADGER
Medium Animal
히트 다이스:3d8+15 (28 hp)
선제권:+3
속도:30 ft. (6 squares), burrow 10 ft.
방어도:16 (+3 Dex, +3 natural), touch 13, flat-footed 13
기본 공격/드잡이:+2/+4
공격:Claw +4 melee (1d4+2)
전력 공격:2 claws +4 melee (1d4+2) and bite –1 melee (1d6+1)
공간범위/도달범위:5 ft./5 ft.
특수 공격:격노
Special Qualities:저광시야, 냄새
내성 굴림:Fort +7, Ref +6, Will +4
능력:Str 14, Dex 17, Con 19, Int 2, Wis 12, Cha 10
스킬:듣기 +6, 감지 +6
특기:경계, 거칠음, 추적B
환경:Temperate forests
집단:Solitary or cete (2–5)
도전 지수:2
전리품:None
성향:Always neutral
성장:4–9 HD (Large)
레벨 보정:—

These vicious creatures tolerate no intrusions. They cannot burrow into solid rock, but can 이동 through just about any material softer than that. A 흉폭한 오소리 usually leaves behind a usable tunnel 5 feet in diameter when burrowing unless the material it’s moving through is very loose.

A 흉폭한 오소리 is from 5 to 7 feet in length and can weigh up to 500 pounds.

전투

Combat

흉폭한 오소리 공격 with their sharp claws and teeth.

격노 (Ex): A 흉폭한 오소리 that takes 피해 in 전투 flies into a berserk 격노 on its next turn, clawing and biting madly until either it or its opponent is 죽음. It gains +4 근력, +4 건강, and –2 AC. The creature cannot end its 격노 voluntarily.

흉폭한 박쥐

DIRE BAT
Large Animal
히트 다이스:4d8+12 (30 hp)
선제권:+6
속도:20 ft. (4 squares), 비행 40 ft. (good)
방어도:20 (–1 size, +6 Dex, +5 natural), touch 15, flat-footed 14
기본 공격/드잡이:+3/+10
공격:Bite +5 melee (1d8+4)
전력 공격:Bite +5 melee (1d8+4)
공간범위/도달범위:10 ft./5 ft.
특수 공격:—
Special Qualities:Blindsense 40 ft.
내성 굴림:Fort +7, Ref +10, Will +6
능력:Str 17, Dex 22, Con 17, Int 2, Wis 14, Cha 6
스킬:숨기 +4, 듣기 +12*, 조용히 이동 +11, 감지 +8*
특기:경계, 은신
환경:Temperate deserts
집단:Solitary or colony (5–8)
도전 지수:2
전리품:None
성향:Always neutral
성장:5–12 HD (Large)
레벨 보정:—

A 흉폭한 박쥐 has a wingspan of 15 feet and weighs about 200 pounds.

전투

Combat

흉폭한 박쥐 swoop down upon unsuspecting prey from above.

Blindsense (Ex): A 흉폭한 박쥐 uses echolocation to pinpoint creatures within 40 feet. Opponents still have total 은폐 against the 박쥐 unless it can actually see them.

스킬: 흉폭한 박쥐 have a +4 racial bonus on 감지 and 듣기 checks. These bonuses are lost if its blindsense is negated.

흉폭한 곰

DIRE BEAR
Large Animal
히트 다이스:12d8+51 (105 hp)
선제권:+1
속도:40 ft. (8 squares)
방어도:17 (–1 size, +1 Dex, +7 natural), touch 10, flat-footed 16
기본 공격/드잡이:+9/+23
공격:Claw +19 melee (2d4+10)
전력 공격:2 claws +19 melee (2d4+10) and bite +13 melee (2d8+5)
공간범위/도달범위:10 ft./5 ft.
특수 공격:Improved grab
Special Qualities:저광시야, 냄새
내성 굴림:Fort +12, Ref +9, Will +9
능력:Str 31, Dex 13, Con 19, Int 2, Wis 12, Cha 10
스킬:듣기 +10, 감지 +10, 수영 +13
특기:경계, 지구력, 달리기, 거칠음, 무기 집중 (claw)
환경:Cold forests
집단:Solitary or pair
도전 지수:7
전리품:None
성향:Always neutral
성장:13–16 HD (Large); 17–36 HD (Huge)
레벨 보정:—

The omnivorous 흉폭한 곰 usually does not bother creatures that try to avoid it, but will aggressively defend a kill or other source of food. It will not hesitate to rip apart anything that might contain something edible.

A typical 흉폭한 곰 is 12 feet long and weighs as much as 8,000 pounds.

전투

Combat

A 흉폭한 곰 공격 by tearing at opponents with its claws.

Improved Grab (Ex): To use this ability, a 흉폭한 곰 must hit with a claw 공격. It can then attempt to start a 드잡이 as a free action without provoking an 공격 of opportunity.

흉폭한 맷돼지

DIRE BOAR
Large Animal
히트 다이스:7d8+21 (52 hp)
선제권:+0
속도:40 ft. (8 squares)
방어도:15 (–1 size, +6 natural), touch 9, flat-footed 15
기본 공격/드잡이:+5/+17
공격:Gore +12 melee (1d8+12)
전력 공격:Gore +12 melee (1d8+12)
공간범위/도달범위:10 ft./5 ft.
특수 공격:Ferocity
Special Qualities:저광시야, 냄새
내성 굴림:Fort +8, Ref +5, Will +8
능력:Str 27, Dex 10, Con 17, Int 2, Wis 13, Cha 8
스킬:듣기 +8, 감지 +8
특기:경계, 지구력, 강철의 의지
환경:Temperate forests
집단:Solitary or herd (5–8)
도전 지수:4
전리품:None
성향:Always neutral
성장:8–16 HD (Large); 17–21 HD (Huge)
레벨 보정:—

흉폭한 맷돼지 are omnivorous and spend most of their time rooting around, much as ordinary pigs do. They viciously 공격 anything that approaches them, however.

흉폭한 맷돼지 grow up to 12 feet long and weigh as much as 2,000 pounds.

전투

Combat

A 흉폭한 맷돼지 돌격 its opponent, trying to rip the target open with its tusks.

Ferocity (Ex): A 흉폭한 맷돼지 is such a tenacious combatant that it continues to fight without penalty even while 행동 불능 or 죽어가고 있음.

흉폭한 사자

DIRE LION
Large Animal
히트 다이스:8d8+24 (60 hp)

도플갱어 are strange beings that are able to take on the shapes of those they encounter. In its natural form, the creature looks more or less humanoid, but slender and frail, with gangly limbs and half-formed features. The flesh is pale and hairless. Its large, bulging eyes are yellow with slitted pupils. A 도플갱어’s appearance is deceiving even when it’s in its true form. A 도플갱어 is hardy, with a natural agility not in keeping with its frail appearance.

도플갱어 make excellent use of their natural mimicry to stage ambushes, bait 함정, and infiltrate humanoid society. Although not usually evil, they are interested only in themselves and regard all others as playthings to be manipulated and deceived.

It is natural form a 도플갱어 is about 5-1/2 feet tall and weighs about 150 pounds.

전투

COMBAT

When in its natural form, a 도플갱어 strikes with its powerful fists. In the shape of a 군인 or some other armed person, it 공격 with whatever weapon is appropriate. In such cases, it uses its 생각 감지 ability to employ the same tactics and strategies as the person it is impersonating.

생각 감지 (Su): A 도플갱어 can continuously use 생각 감지 as the spell (시전자 레벨 18th; Will DC 13 negates). It can suppress or resume this ability as a free action. The save DC is 매력-based.

Change Shape (Su): A 도플갱어 can assume the shape of any Small or Medium humanoid. In humanoid form, the 도플갱어 loses its natural 공격. A 도플갱어 can remain in its humanoid form until it chooses to assume a new one. A change in form cannot be dispelled, but a 도플갱어 reverts to its natural form when killed. A 진실의 시야 spell or ability reveals its natural form.

스킬: A 도플갱어 has a +4 racial bonus on 허세 and 변장 checks.

*When using its change shape ability, a 도플갱어 gets an additional +10 circumstance bonus on 변장 checks. If it can read an opponent’s mind, it gets a further +4 circumstance bonus on 허세 and 변장 checks.

도플갱어를 캐릭터로

DOPPELGANGERS AS CHARACTERS

도플갱어 characters possess the following racial traits.

— +2 근력, +2, 민첩, +2 건강, +2 지능, +4 지혜, +2 매력.

—Medium size.

—A 도플갱어’s base land 속도 is 30 feet.

—암흑시야: 도플갱어 can see in the dark up to 60 feet.

—Racial 히트 다이스: A 도플갱어 begins with four 레벨 of monstrous humanoid, which provide 4d8 히트 다이스, a base 공격 보너스 of +4, and base 내성 굴림 bonuses of Fort +1, Ref +4, and Will +4.

—Racial 스킬: A 도플갱어’s monstrous humanoid 레벨 give it skill points equal to 7 x (2 + Int modifier). Its 직업 스킬 are 허세, 외교, 변장, 위협, 듣기, 의도 파악, and 감지.

—Racial 특기: A 도플갱어’s monstrous humanoid 레벨 give it two 특기.

— +4 natural 갑옷 bonus.

— +4 racial bonus on 허세 and 변장 checks. When using its change shape ability, a 도플갱어 gets an additional +10 circumstance bonus on 변장 checks. If it can read an opponent’s mind, it gets a further +4 circumstance bonus on 허세 and 변장 checks.

—특수 공격 (see above): 생각 감지.

—Special Qualities (see above): Change shape, immunity to 수면 and charm effects.

—Automatic Languages: Common. Bonus Languages: Auran, Dwarven, Elven, 노움, 하플링, 거인, Terran.

—선호 직업: 도적.

—레벨 보정 +4.
